response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $14,000. I am confident this price reflects both the value of the product and provides you with an attractive opportunity. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of us working together.", "product_price": 14000}
